headline: Cell-free Protein Synthesis Market Research and Global Forecast Report 2025-2030: Integration Into Next-Generation Diagnostics and Sensing Platforms Drive Adoption
summary: The cell-free protein synthesis (CFPS) market is set to reach USD 308.9 million by 2030, growing at a CAGR of 7.3%. Key growth drivers include rising demand for rapid protein production, adoption of AI/ML, and expanding applications in synthetic biology and drug discovery. The CFPS services segment will grow rapidly due to increasing demand for customized solutions and outsourcing. Enzyme engineering dominates the application segment, while Asia-Pacific is projected to see the highest CAGR due t
